task.title: How to Add Watermarks in Your Word Docs
task.shortdesc: Here you will find out how to add watermarks in Microsoft Word documents.

step.cmd: On the Design tab, select Watermark.
The Watermark menu opens and offers some ready-made watermarks such as "Confidential" or "Do not Copy". Choose the one you prefer.
If you want to use your own design, click on Custom Watermark, and add the logo or text you want.

taskbody.result: You have added a watermark to your Microsoft Word document.
